description: Deployment tracking for multi-chain Mailer contracts

contracts.mailer: Single contract with messaging, delegation, and permission system

features: Permission system for smart contract sponsorship
Unified fee processing with gas optimizations
optimizations: Storage packing (uint128, uint8, bool) - saves ~60k gas on deployment
Optimized ClaimableAmount struct (1 slot instead of 2) - saves ~20k gas per claim
Short-circuit permission checks - saves ~2.1k gas when sender == payer
Delete optimization instead of zeroing - saves ~15k gas on claims
Early return fee calculations - saves ~200 gas
Cache storage reads - saves ~2.1k gas per cached read
Overall gas savings: 10-17% reduction across all operations

programs.mailer: Native Solana program with messaging and delegation

features: Treasury PDA pattern (no permission system needed)
